# filedata_file (Resource)

File data resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "filedata_file" "file1" {
  file_name = "file1"
  lines = [
    "line1",
    "line2",
    "line3",
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `file_name` (String) File name
- `lines` (List of String) Lines to write to the file
